links.title: $AUY Yamana Gold Provides an Update on Exploration Activities at Canadian Malartic; Announces Positive Drill Results From East Gouldie
links.description: Download a PDF of detailed drill hole results for Canadian Malartic TORONTO, Oct. 28, 2020 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- YAMANA GOLD INC. (TSX:YRI; NYSE:AUY; LSE:AUY) ("Yamana" or "the Company") provides an exploration update for the Canadian Malartic mine, announcing exceptional drill results that provide further support for the development of a future underground operation at the East Gouldie, Odyssey, and East Malartic zones with significant additional mineral resources and extended life of mine.

messages.body: $AUY Better days on there way starting with ER tomorrow

$BA $VLDR $AUY $AAPL $SPY 
CAN SOMEBODY FILL ME IN ON WTF HAS BEEN HAPPENING?

I AM ON VACATION IN SO. CALI SIPPING PINA COLADAS AND THINGS OF THAT NATURE. 

2020 P/L IS HANGING ON BY A THREAD. LUCKILY, I AM SITTING ON CASH AND MAY DEPLOY CAPITAL SOON. 

I WILL RESUME TO THE BEACH AFTER THIS POST AND CONSIDER DOUBLING DOWN. 

THANK YOU 
-BIG SHARKY
$AUY Got 5k@5.75, but I’m not a quitter. GUESS WERE GOING LONG BOYS.
$AUY 18  MILLION Shares traded...the night before earnings...discount price?????? I don't think so.......

$AUY Better days will come. I have built a 60% position with most of it at 5.35. I will add shares on any drops below this level. Bedrock is at 4.80 & I will save some ammo if needed. I look for very large gains on this next yr.  Probably a double as gold goes on the big run based on massive stimulus. To me this is just loading time & patience will be required. The rewards are going to be fantastic.
$AUY Nice discount. Good risk/reward here, in both calls and stock. Expecting ER beat, revenue is key.
$AUY Bought some calls here. Easy money with upcoming ER.
$AUY been watching this stock for a while waiting for an opportunity to buy in great potential good options I'm in
$AUY So Trump is getting set to address the country in a live speech. He needs the stock market. Watching to see what he will say.

$AUY The share price is just floating around with every dollar up or down in gold now. The earnings should at least provide some pretty good support or price increase. It has pre sold itself going into earnings which I like. I am fairly confident in this one now & into next year. The odds are in our favor. Good luck longs.
